description: This file defines a configuration class for the BackendAPI service, utilizing Pydantic's BaseSettings to load environment variables, with methods to normalize certain settings like CORS origins and observability URLs. It also provides a singleton accessor for the settings.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: A Pydantic BaseSettings subclass that loads and validates configuration from environment variables, with additional normalization methods.

methods.name: parse_cors_origins
methods.description: Normalizes CORS origins from environment variable input (list or comma-separated string) into a list of strings.

methods.name: get_settings
methods.description: Returns a singleton instance of Settings, with normalized CORS origins and observability URL.
